question: Can Bryhel share its clients and some projects ?
answer: We understand the importance of confidentiality in the beauty industry. All of our relationships are confidential. We never share our clients' names, brands we work with, or their formulations unless we have their consent. We usually sign Non-Disclosure Agreements and guarantee to protect the competitiveness of our customers.

question: Can Bryhel provide a catalog of products ?
answer: At Bryhel, we have a different approach: each project is unique. We will work with you on understanding your project and help you reach it by proposing adequate products, development and ingredients. Consequently, we do not offer catalogs but will suggest you the best fits for your vision.

question: Can Bryhel provide a catalog of products ?
answer: You can contact us and write to us! Also, don't forget to check and follow our social media channels; we love to connect. Scroll down to say hello!
